block.name: Threshold
block.doc: Implements a comparator with configurable hysteresis. The output transitions from 0.0 to 1.0 when the input signal transitions from below to above the High level. The output transitions from 1.0 to 0.0 when the input signal transitions from above to below the Low level. The Low level must be less than the High level.

param.name: Low
param.doc: Sets the level for the high-to-low transition.

param.name: High
param.doc: Sets the level for the low-to-high transition.

param.name: Initial State
param.doc: Sets whether the initial state of the output should be 0.0 or 1.0.
